title: Navy in focus. Special edition No. 9. Island patrol
creator_credit: Australia. Navy Office. Directorate of Public Relations
brief_description: On patrol in the waters of Papua New Guinea, HMAS Aitape is one of the five patrol boats keeping watch on the thousands of miles of coastline. Shows the boat visiting out-of-the-way villages and the headquarters of the Papua New Guinea Division of the RAN, as well as the training of sailors from Papua New Guinea and the RAN.
